heroTitle1: Reuniting Lost Items With Their Owners
heroSubtitle: The modern way to report and find lost and found items in your city, with the help of our community and partner businesses.
feature1Desc: Browse our public database of lost and found items. Filter by category, location, and date to quickly find what you're looking for.
feature2Desc: Effortlessly report lost or found items with our simple form. Add details and photos to increase the chances of a successful reunion.
feature3Desc: We partner with local businesses and transport hubs to manage their lost property, creating a centralized network for everyone.
benefit1: Centralized platform for all lost & found items.
benefit3: High success rate in item recovery.
successQuote: I lost my camera at the airport and thought it was gone forever. Thanks to FindItNow, I was contacted by the finder within a day!
downloadTitle: Find It, Report It, Get It Back
downloadSubtitle: Get the full experience on our mobile app.
faqLink1: How do I report a lost or found item?
faqLink2: Is my personal information kept private?
faqLink3: What if someone falsely claims my found item?
faqLink4: How does the business partnership work?
testimonialsSubtitle: Real stories from people we've helped.
footerReuniting: Reuniting the world, one lost item at a time.
aboutSubtitle: We believe in the power of community to bring lost treasures back home.
aboutMissionDesc: Our mission is to create the most efficient and trusted platform for reuniting people with their lost belongings. We leverage technology to connect individuals, communities, and businesses, turning moments of panic into stories of relief and gratitude. We aim to make the process of reporting and recovering items simple, secure, and effective for everyone.
aboutValues1Desc: We foster a supportive network of honest finders and hopeful owners.
aboutValues2Desc: We prioritize security and privacy to build a platform you can rely on.
aboutValues3Desc: We continuously improve our technology to make finding easier and faster.
aboutJoinDesc: Help us grow our community. Report an item, browse listings, or partner with us.
accountSubtitle: Manage your reported items and claims.
accountNoSubmissionsDesc: When you report a lost or found item, it will appear here.
accountNoClaimsDesc: Claims you make on found items will be tracked here.
accountDeleteItemDesc: This will permanently delete your item listing. This action cannot be undone.
browseSubtitle: Search through recently reported lost and found items.
browseNoItemsDesc: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later.
browseItemNotFoundDesc: The item you are looking for might have been removed or the link is incorrect.
contactSubtitle: We’re here to help. Ask us anything, or share your feedback.
contactFormDesc: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
contactInfoDesc: Prefer to reach out directly? Here’s how.
contactFollowDesc: Stay up to date with our latest news.
contactToastSuccessDesc: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.
contactToastErrorDesc: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again.
faq1Title: How do I report a lost or found item?
faq1Content: Simply click on the 'Report a Lost Item' or 'Report a Found Item' buttons on the homepage. You'll be guided through a simple form to provide details and photos of the item.
faq2Title: Is my personal information kept private?
faq2Content: Yes. Your contact information is only shared securely when you decide to connect with another user to return an item. We do not display your personal details publicly.
faq3Title: What if someone falsely claims an item I found?
faq3Content: Our platform allows you to ask for specific proof of ownership. The claimant must provide details that only the true owner would know. You have the final say in verifying a claim before arranging a return.
faq4Title: How much does it cost to use FindItNow?
faq4Content: FindItNow is completely free for individuals to use for reporting and finding lost items.
faq5Title: How does the business partnership work?
faq5Content: We partner with businesses like airports, malls, and hotels to manage their lost and found inventory. This creates a wider, more efficient network for everyone and helps businesses return more items to their owners.
faq6Title: What should I do after I've recovered my item?
faq6Content: Once you have safely recovered your item, you can mark the enquiry as 'Resolved' in your account. This closes the enquiry and helps us keep our listings up-to-date.
hiwStep1Desc: Lost something? Report it. Found something? Report it. Or, browse the listings to see if your item is already there.
hiwStep2Desc: Fill out a simple form with a description, location, date, and photos. The more detail, the better the chance of a match.
hiwStep3Desc: Our system works to find matches. You’ll be notified when someone makes a claim on your found item, or reports finding your lost item.
hiwStep4Desc: Use our secure messaging to verify ownership and arrange a safe and convenient return. Another successful reunion!
itemResolvedDesc: This item has been successfully returned to its owner. This listing is now closed.
isThisYourItemDesc: If you believe this item is yours, you can submit a claim to the person who found it. Please provide enough detail to prove your ownership.
cannotClaimOwnItem: You cannot claim an item that you have reported yourself.
privacyIntroContent: Welcome to FindItNow. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.
privacyInfoCollectContent1: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number when you register an account, report an item, or make a claim. We also collect non-personal information, such as browser type and operating system, to improve our services.
privacyInfoCollectContent2: When you report an item, we collect details about the item, including its description, location, and photos you provide.
privacyInfoUseContent: We use the information we collect to operate and maintain our platform, facilitate communication between users for the purpose of returning lost items, send you notifications and updates, and improve our services.
privacyInfoShareContent: We do not sell your personal information. Your contact details are only shared between a finder and a claimant after a claim has been accepted to facilitate the return of an item. We may share information with law enforcement if required by law.
privacyInfoKeepContent: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with our services. We will securely delete your information when it is no longer needed.
privacyInfoSafeContent: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable.
privacyMinorsContent: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will take steps to delete such information.
privacyRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. You can manage your information through your account settings or by contacting us directly.
reportFormLostDesc: Provide as much detail as possible to help others identify your item.
reportFormFoundDesc: Thank you for being a good samaritan! Fill out the details below to help us find the owner.
reportFormEditDesc: Update the details of your item report below.
reportFormDescPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description. Include colors, materials, brands, and any unique features.
reportFormLocationPlaceholder: e.g., Central Park, near the fountain
reportFormContactEmailDescNew: This will be used for notifications and to create a temporary account if you don't have one.
reportFormContactEmailDescAuth: This is tied to your account and cannot be changed here.
reportFormContactEmailDescExisting: This cannot be changed as it's tied to the original report.
reportFormPhonePlaceholder: Your phone number for easier contact
reportFormImageDescNew: The first image will be the main one. Add more to help with identification.
reportFormImageDescExisting: You can upload new images to replace the old ones.
servicesSubtitle: Tailored solutions for individuals and businesses.
servicesIndividualDesc: Helping you find what you've lost.
servicesBusinessFeat4: Analytics and reporting on recovered items
servicesReadyDesc: Join thousands of users and businesses making a difference.
termsAgreementContent: By using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
termsServiceDescContent: FindItNow provides a platform to connect individuals who have lost items with those who have found them. We are a neutral facilitator and are not responsible for the items themselves or the interactions between users.
termsUserConductContent: You agree to use our service responsibly and truthfully. You will not post misleading information, misuse the platform for illegal activities, or harass other users. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
termsDisclaimersContent: The service is provided 'as is' without any warranties. We do not guarantee that any lost item will be found or that any found item will be returned.
termsLiabilityContent: FindItNow shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, or any loss of property or information.
termsGoverningLawContent: These terms shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is based, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

validation.proofMin: Please provide a detailed proof of at least 20 characters.
validation.subjectMin: Subject must be at least 5 characters.
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters.
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters.
validation.itemNameMin: Item name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters.
validation.locationMin: Location must be at least 3 characters.
validation.imageRequired: At least one image is required.
validation.imageSize: Each image must be less than 5MB.
validation.storyMin: Story must be at least 10 characters.

forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a code to reset your password.

partnerDashboardSubtitle: Welcome to your lost and found management hub.
partnerRecentItemsDesc: Here are the latest items you've added to the system.
claimFormProofPlaceholder: Describe the item in detail. Mention any unique features, contents, or scratches that only the owner would know.
claimFormProofImageDesc: Upload a receipt, a photo of you with the item, or anything that proves ownership.
haveYouFoundThisDesc: If you've found this item, please send a message to the owner. Let them know where and when you found it.
foundFormLocationFoundPlaceholder: e.g., On a bench in City Park

enquiriesNoEnquiriesDesc: When someone claims your item or messages you about a lost one, you'll see it here.
